author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Autosports Group Says HY ‍Profit Attributable Up 491.1% To $12.1 Mln
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Autosports Group Ltd:
* HY ‍PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE UP 491.1% TO $12.1 MILLION​ * ‍HY REVENUES FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES UP 379.3% TO $792.7 MILLION ​
* INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 4.2 CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
